Question: The seven-minute-long film, also featuring Buck Henry and Teri Garr, was written by and starred this person.
Hints: This person wrote and starred in Shopgirl (2005), based on his own novella (2000), and starred in Cheaper by the Dozen 2.
Williams initially paid this person out of his own pocket.
In 1999, this person and Hawn starred in a remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy, The Out-of-Towners.
